docs.title: 👨🏻‍🏫 SKILLS and TECHNIQUES

docs.text: TRPM2 governs stress-induced depressive-like behaviors The role of oxidative stress in major depressive disorder Transient Receptor Potential Melastatin 2 (TRPM2) TRPM2 governs stress-induced depressive-like behaviors TRPM2 deficiency alleviates depressive-like behaviors in the chronic unpredictable stress model of mice. TRPM2 mediates ROS accumulation in the mouse hippocampus. TRPM2 facilitates Ca2+-dependent calpain activation. TRPM2 deficiency promotes synaptic transmission under stressful conditions. TRPM2 deficiency enhances adult hippocampal neurogenesis. Schematic diagram Last update: July 28, 2021
